Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: Conversely , the majority of families with male and female breast cancer were due to BRCA2 ( 76 % ) .

Let's think step by step.

1. Breast cancer (male and female)

The paragraph mentions "breast cancer" in the context of families having this condition, with no distinction made between male and female variants. Therefore, "breast cancer" is the identified disease entity in this paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Disease.

Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.
